# function: ipv4_long2ip

Converts an IPv4 address from its 32-bit integer representation to dotted-decimal string form.

## Example Usage

```terraform
output "ip" {
  value = provider::zeus::ipv4_long2ip(3232235777)
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
ipv4_long2ip(ipv4_long number) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `ipv4_long` (Number) IPv4 address as 32-bit integer in range [0, 4294967295]
